name: See Me
description:
"Mirrors are places where they can see you. I don't want them to see."

-Caleb

-------------------------------------------------------

Break mirrors with Caleb in this 5 minute adventure created for SCREAM JAM 2020.

Features 2 endings!

-------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Fullscreen: F4

Movement: Arrow Keys

Interact: Enter or Space

Back: Esc or X
